node.text:
Time to mingle and munch on a fantabulous Ratatouille Chilli Cheese Toast or Carom Seed Scented Quail Eggs while sipping a well-paired cocktail. Step into The Bar at The Raviz Kovalam for multiple servings of perfect moods set by the sounds of the ocean.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
